summary: Requiem 1.8.x patch for The Huntsman by InsanitySorrow
descriptionHtml:
Requiem 1.8.x patch for The Huntsman by InsanitySorrow

Damage and draw speed have been adjusted to match Requiem's values. [u]Version 2[/u]: The bow starts as a light bow and becomes a heavy bow with the final two upgrades.


[u]Installation:[/u]
Use NMM, MO, or just extract Requiem - The Huntsman.esp into your Skyrim/Data folder.

[u]Load order:[/u]
Use LOOT or place Requiem - The Huntsman.esp after Requiem and The Huntsman and before Requiem for the Indifferent.

Skyrim.esm
....
....
....
The Huntsman.esp
....
Requiem.esp
....
Requiem - The Huntsman.esp
....
Bashed Patch, 0.esp                    <--- if you use Wrye Bash
Requiem for the Indifferent.esp


[u]Credits/Thanks:[/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/?]Requiem[/url]: Ogerboss and Xarrian
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57870/?]The Huntsman[/url]: InsanitySorrow
author: spikyfishy
